com.threerings.honeybird
Interface Filter

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilterExpression, Filters.BooleanFilter
public interface Filter

Restricts the results from a query.

Method Summary
 Filter and(Filter additional)
          Combines this filter with the given filter and restricts results such that both must accept an item to include it.
 Set<Source<?>> getSources()
          Returns the sources that this filter restricts.
 String makeFilter()
          Returns the representation of this filter for inclusion in the query.
 Filter or(Filter additional)
          Combines this filter with the given filter and allows an item through if either accepts it.
 

Method Detail

makeFilter

String makeFilter()
Returns the representation of this filter for inclusion in the query.

getSources

Set<Source<?>> getSources()
Returns the sources that this filter restricts.

and

Filter and(Filter additional)
Combines this filter with the given filter and restricts results such that both must accept an item to include it. This has a lower precedence than or(com.threerings.honeybird.Filter) if an or is also included in a filter.

or

Filter or(Filter additional)
Combines this filter with the given filter and allows an item through if either accepts it. This has a higher precedence than and(com.threerings.honeybird.Filter) if an and is also included in a filter.
